name: Pizza Defender
description:
PIZZA DEFENDER

Controls: WASD or arrows to move. Click to shoot. Mouse to aim!

You play as a piece of mozarella with a machinegun, on a pizza. Zombie ingredients come towards the pizza and start noming on it shrinking the pizza. You can only walk on pizza so you need to defend it. If the pizza gets too small, you will have no are to move on, and you will most certainly get eaten.

Will do:

  • You win after a certan amount of waves.
  • If you kill the zombie ingredients, they become normal. And if you get a certain amount of needed normal ingredients, than you win the level. (Missions style)
  • If a zombie that does not eat pizza gets to the Basilic Braga(basilics name.. Don’t ask), you lose.

 

PS: Its my first LDJam
